actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

official_title: To direct the Secretary of Transportation to permit the State of Utah to construct a hook ramp as part of the highway project to reconstruct the interchange at Interstate Route 15 and University Parkway in Orem, Utah.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to permit the State of Utah to construct a hook ramp connecting 1200 West to Interstate Route 15 as part of the highway project to reconstruct the interchange at Interstate Route 15 and University Parkway in Orem, Utah.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Transportation to permit the State of Utah to construct a hook ramp as part of the highway project to reconstruct the interchange at Interstate Route 15 and University Parkway in Orem, Utah.
